Those are some real tight uniforms. They almost make it look as if they aren't wearing a top.
I wish to see the rest...
Totally agree with what this dude saying below
good thing it's in the basement, with only one entrance to barricade before putting the place to the torch.
I mean, I figured this wouldn't be yuri thanks to the tags, but then this went and teased yuri before ruining everything. How mean.
So disappointing. Nothing really happened
Uhm ok then
Omg, what the hell
Oh boy part 1 and everyone can see where this shit is going so nope this shit gets on the blacklist too.

overall, disappointing, there was potential, there was build up, and then our hopes, of a nice wholesome Yuri story, are destroyed, shat on, this was a let down, my disappointment is immeasurable, and my day is ruined.
tag your fucking shit right
What a waste.
Bruh fck this commie shit all my homies hate group sex

wholesome yuri where?

Look at this Niiggerr Artist, wasted potential smh
That definitely took a turn. I was expecting wholesome yuri
When you go to the school library to get good grades and found the teachers/student council sex dungeon

Saw the Student Council title and I was so ready for a continuation of the Kanzaki Hitomi story. This was okay, if a bit by-the-books for Hakaba. I'll agree a yuri story would've been a nice detour.

The wait continues.

@Solitudine: I think the author was saying that "this academy nurtures female students to be future sluts for the rich and powerful or some equivalent shit like that. Student Council President in this academy is the highest honor? My ass, they are turned into fuck toys" that kind of dark story.

So the Prez was kinda hinting for Rinka what to expect when she takes up the offer "Look if you are the next Prez, be rdy cuz this is the shit you gonna be facing." Looks like Nana dodged the bullet but Rinka is now fucked. Part 2 pls! PS: I usually don't like these kind of dark stories cuz they are gloomy and always has terrible fates/tragedies in them, but hell, my curiosity got the better of me, now I want the next part to see how the story progresses :D
tag your shit right motherfucker
Well this was unpleasant. I don't really get the appeal

@Solitudine My best guess is that all those guys are rich donors to the school and the president along with probably either other ex-presidents or select students are "sacrificed" to keep the money rolling in.

??????????? 
question?

wasted plot, it was all going the yuri route and boom

no
bamboozled yet again
I was expecting a dark yuri story. But got this disappointment instead. To be fair, I didn't read the tags.....
Did someone understand what was being said at the least page? I’ve read other works like this one but I this time I didn’t really get what the author was trying to say
